title: The Wembanyama Experience, Potential Lottery Teams
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk Victor Wembanyama’s impressive debut, what teams may be ‘tanking’ this year and ‘What Is Going On In’ Orlando. Plus, the guys talk about the dust up between Draymond Green and Jordan Poole.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Victor Wembanyama’s Impressive Debut, Green VS. Poole Dust Up
